article: A great many people are disappointed because of unrealistic expectations. With _ written all over his face, the clerk _ measured out and wrapped the cloth, then held it out teasingly, _ forward to receive his " _ The woman got the package quickly from the clerk and pointed to a little old man standing beside her. "Grandpa will pay the bill instead of me," she _ . He was no doubt disappointed. But in the course of living, many people are _ when others do not live up to their expectations.
